submission:
# @param {Integer} m
# @param {Integer} n
# @param {Integer[]} horizontal_cut
# @param {Integer[]} vertical_cut
# @return {Integer}
def minimum_cost(m, n, horizontal_cut, vertical_cut)
  return 0 if horizontal_cut.nil? || vertical_cut.nil? || m.zero? || n.zero?

  horizontal_cut.sort!.reverse! if horizontal_cut.is_a?(Array)
  vertical_cut.sort!.reverse! if vertical_cut.is_a?(Array)

  res = 0
  hzntl = 1
  vert = 1
  i = 0
  j = 0

  while i < m && j < n
    if horizontal_cut[i].to_i > vertical_cut[j].to_i
      res += horizontal_cut[i].to_i * vert
      hzntl += 1
      i += 1
    else
      res += vertical_cut[j].to_i * hzntl
      vert += 1
      j += 1
    end
  end

  total = 0
  while i < m
    total += horizontal_cut[i].to_i
    i += 1
  end
  res += total * vert

  total = 0
  while j < n
    total += vertical_cut[j].to_i
    j += 1
  end
  res += total * hzntl

  res
end
